Recommendations: The instructional materials or modules produced by faculty members should be submitted for review and approval of the Instructional Materials Development Committee.
Conduct another tracer study to determine the employability of the Cooperative Management graduates in the recent years.
Continuing faculty development seminars and training especially in the area of cooperative management should be conducted to meet the demands of the curriculum.
Course outlines should also indicate the complete date of revision during the school year.

Student copy of the curriculum sheet should indicate the number of lectures and laboratory hours. Another column is also suggested for the grade for easy monitoring of the students' academic performance.
Proper documentation, if ever a curriculum revision is scheduled for BS Cooperative Management, is suggested to cover the process and for record purposes.
